forms.name: custom
forms.title: Customized form
forms.description:
This form is customized using global CSS and inline CSS.

The form's background has been made lightgray, the submit button is red and the results are wrapped in a scrolling viewport. This was achieved using a global "custom_css": "custom.css", form configuration option.

The background of the input box has been turned green. This is done using the style option for the fom field.
